text:
Dear all, has anyone experienced the focus drifting off while using Lightsheet7? Or  when imaging multiple tiles, that only some tiles are out of focus?

The RI was measured to be quite stable even with the temperature changes in this case. Also that sometimes it was only one out of a dozen tiles that was out of focus. We were wondering if it could be some other factors here... I've seen it several times now in 2 different imaging setups.
